subject: Football
Cheating
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Florida State’s football team will be short-handed  in the Music City Bowl against Kentucky because the Seminoles will be missing players who were suspended for cheating on, of all things, a music test.
snippet: Florida State’s football team will be short-handed  in the Music City Bowl against Kentucky because the Seminoles will be missing players who were suspended for cheating on, of all things, a music test.
